Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: AgOS 2.0 - The Antigravity Boardroom upgrade

Major system upgrade introducing:

## The Boardroom \(Orchestration Layer\)
- Meeting protocols for Mission Briefings, Team Talks, Sprint Reviews, Incident Response
- Agent summoning matrix for intelligent routing
- Meeting templates for structured collaboration
- Culture guide with decision authority levels \(L1-L4\)

## Agent Profiles \(All 24 agents enhanced\)
- Human names and nicknames for each agent
- Profile cards with personality and philosophy
- Collaboration style preferences
- Performance metrics tracking
- Learning logs for continuous improvement

## Feedback Loop System
- Task outcome logging
- Pattern detection \(skill gap identification\)
- Agent health metrics
- Inter-AI communication protocol

## Auto-Sync & Automation
- validate_agents.py - SKILL.md compliance checking
- auto_commit.py - Smart commit message generation
- feedback_engine.py - Health metrics and gap detection
- GitHub Actions workflow for CI/CD

## Ecosystem Creator
- New agent: Genesis Nova "The Cloner"
- init_workspace.py - Create projects from master template
- sync_ecosystem.py - Sync changes across projects
- Support for saas, ecommerce, trading, content, agency types

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
